root.name: Sugoroku Ginga Senki
root.description: OverviewSugoroku Ginga Senki is a sugoroku-style game (backgammon), where you roll the dice and move your piece, then follow the instructions on the spot you landed on. The player hires underlings from the space station, and occupies stars one after another.Manual (Page 3 and Page 4)Characters featured in the manual

similar_games.game: Hidamari Sketch: Doko Demo Sugoroku x 365
